snippet: The Sprint Nextel Corporation said that it lost $1.3 billion in its fourth quarter, about the same as a year ago, as it revamped its network for a comeback against its bigger competitors.
abstract: Sprint Nextel Corporation reports fourth-quarter loss of $1.3 billion, nearly flat from year-ago period, as it revamps its network for a comeback against its bigger competitors; revenue was $9 billion, up 3.2 percent from $8.7 billion year ago.
lead_paragraph: The Sprint Nextel Corporation said that it lost $1.3 billion in its fourth quarter, about the same as a year ago, as it revamped its network for a comeback against its bigger competitors.

headline.main: Sprint’s Loss Is Steady, but Revenue Is Up 3.2%
headline.print_headline: Sprint’s Loss Is Steady, But Revenue Is Up 3.2%
